locale_save_often.message: Enregistrez votre travail souvent! Modifications sont enregistrées automatiquement toutes les cinq minutes, mais ce est une bonne pratique pour sauver fréquemment.

locale_browser_reload.message: Utilisez le bouton de rechargement de votre navigateur pour annuler les modifications.

locale_change_settings_and_sync.message: Si un changement de vos paramètres ne se affiche pas immédiatement, sauvegarder vos données et cliquez sur le bouton de synchronisation (↻); ce qui devrait mettre à jour tout, et sera également garder votre auto-analyseur effectuer à son meilleur.
locale_change_settings_and_sync.description: how to make settings changes take effect

locale_create_account_answer.message: De l'écran principal de démarrage, cliquez sur le bouton «Se inscrire» dans le coin supérieur droit et remplir le formulaire. Si vous n'êtes pas sûr de quel serveur vous devez sélectionner, vous voulez plus susceptibles de choisir 'LingSync'.

locale_create_corpus_answer.message: Après vous être connecté, survolez «Paramètres» et sélectionnez «corpus». Depuis cette page, vous pouvez ajouter un nouveau corpus.

locale_enter_data_answer.message: Après avoir sélectionné un corpus et une session de déclenchement (ou créé une nouvelle session), vous serez redirigé vers la page d'entrée de données. L'élément le plus haut sur cette page est l'espace pour entrer de nouveaux records. Remplissez vos données et / ou d'enregistrement / téléchargement audio et puis cliquez sur 'Créer'. Notez que votre nouveau record ne sera pas enregistré dans la base de données jusqu'à ce que vous cliquez sur le bouton 'Enregistrer' en haut à droite de l'écran!

locale_import_data_answer.message: Vous pouvez importer toute Elicitation Séance en téléchargeant un audio / vidéo (ne importe quel format fonctionne: .wav, .aiff, .mp3, .ogg, .mov, .avi, .3gp, .mp4, etc.) (how-to video) texte ou données (csv, texte brut, TextGrid, Toolbox et plus) (how-to video) utilisant le Prototype app. Ces fonctionnalités d'importation sera déplacé vers les pages corpus d'administration quand il devient une priorité.
locale_import_data_answer.description: answer contains href links which seem to screw up json message format, so I leave it empty for the moment

locale_audio_upload_limit_question.message: Quelle est la limite de la / taille de la vidéo audio qui puis-je télécharger

locale_audio_upload_limit_answer.message: Nous avons mis la limite à 1,5 Go. Si ce est trop faible pour vous, vous êtes probablement en train de faire beaucoup avec audio / vidéo et peut-être même votre ministère a un serveur que vous pouvez installer le service audio sur de sorte que vous ne avez pas à utiliser les ressources de LingSync.org. Si vous avez beaucoup de fichiers vidéo lourds (plus de 300 Mo), vous pouvez également envisager d'utiliser un ou des vidéos privées non cotées sur YouTube, SoundCloud, Google Drive ou même les serveurs de votre ministère pour héberger les fichiers en ligne.

locale_edit_record_question.message: Comment puis-je modifier un élément existant?

locale_edit_record_answer.message: Simple-cliquez sur ne importe où sur l'enregistrement que vous souhaitez modifier. Cela rendra le dossier modifiable. Faites vos changements et cliquez sur le bouton «Terminé». Notez que les changements à cette fiche ne sera pas enregistré dans la base de données jusqu'à ce que vous cliquez sur le bouton 'Enregistrer'!

locale_record_upload_comment_question.message: Comment puis-je enregistrer de l'audio, télécharger des fichiers audio, ou ajouter / voir les commentaires?

locale_record_upload_comment_answer.message:
Click the expand button on a new record or a record in edit mode to access audio and comment features. You may click the collapse button to hide this section.

Recording Audio
To record audio, click the record button. Note that you must then click the 'Allow' button on the browser dropdown at the top of the page. Your audio will begin recording once you click 'Allow'. To stop recording, simply click the 'Recording' button. Your audio will then be processed. This may take a while.

Uploading Audio
To upload audio files, click on 'Choose files' and select one or more audio files from your hard drive. Audio files may be in .wav, .mp3, or .ogg format.

Adding/Deleting Comments
To add a comment, click on the 'Add a comment' link and enter your comment in the popup box. To delete a comment, click on the 'X' next to the comment. You may only delete your own comments. Comments are not editable, so to change what your comment says simply delete it and write a new one.

locale_delete_record_question.message: How do I delete a record or audio file?

locale_delete_record_answer.message: To delete a record, click the relevant record and then click the 'Delete' button. To delete an audio file, click on the 'X' next to the file. In both cases, you will be prompted to verify the deletion. Note that deleting records and files only a flag and does not result in destroying data.

locale_privacy_question.message: Est-ce que mes données sont privées et protégées?

locale_privacy_answer.message: Yes! For more on our policies with respect to your data, please see our web site.
locale_privacy_answer.description: '_' underscore and ':'' colon seem to screw up json format. i kinda remember this with prototype app...

locale_export_answer.message:
You can export your entire database as csv (warning, csv is a lossy format, don't use this for backing up your data), or backup your data as non-lossy json. You can also share your data with other people by adding them to your corpus, or you can make parts of your corpus public and sharable on your corpus' own webpage You can also export lists of data in LaTeX among other things using the Prototype app.

You can also download a word list, glossed word list and a morphemes list, among other things. If you're curious about other exports you can do, contact us and one of the current students will give you a tutorial. Exporting data from LingSync.org is extremely powerful and flexible.
locale_export_answer.prevMessage:
You can export your entire database as csv (warning, csv is a lossy format, don't use this for backing up your data), or backup your data as non-lossy json. You can also share your data with other people by adding them to your corpus, or you can make parts of your corpus public and sharable on your corpus' own webpage You can also export lists of data in LaTeX among other things using the Prototype app.

You can also download a word list, glossed word list and a morphemes list, among other things. If you're curious about other exports you can do, contact us and one of the current students will give you a tutorial. Exporting data from LingSync.org is extremely powerful and flexible.
locale_export_answer.description: links screw up the json format so i leave it empty for the moment

locale_share_session_question.message: Can I share just an elicitation session, not a whole corpus?

locale_share_session_answer.message: If you want to share a elicitation session with someone, you should send us an email to say which session you want to share. We will send you a web widget that accesses only data in that session and lets the user log into that widget to read (if they are allowed) and/or edit (if they are allowed) data. You must put the widget in your own website and/or WordPress blog and provide the url to the user(s). If the user does not have read access on your corpus, you can to provide us with their username(s) so we can add conditional permissions to their account.

locale_multiple_language_question.message: Can I have multiple languages in one corpus?

locale_multiple_language_answer.message: LingSync supports multilingual corpora, as a user you can put anything you wish into a corpus (depending on what makes sense for your own research). Multilingual corpora are very useful, and very common for crosslinguistic studies of linguistic phenomen (for example a cross-linguistic study of applicatives).

locale_multiang_glosser_question.message: If I have multiple languages in a corpus, what would happen to the semi-automatic glosser?

locale_multilang_glosser_answer.message: The semi-auto glosser learns from the context where a morpheme appears, so most often a corpus will rarely have a morpheme that appears in both languages in the same context. This means that a corpora can be multilingual, and still have a reasonaly usable semi-automatic glosser.

locale_combine_corpora_answer.message: Yes, you can combine corpora. If you want to combine corpora you should send us an email to tell us the names of the corpora to combine, and where to combine them to. We will verify that you have permission to do this, and do the combining and testing of the result.

locale_combine_glossers_question.message: Can I combine glossers and use it for multiple corpora?

locale_combine_glossers_answer.message: By default, each corpus has its own glosser fed by the data in that corpus. If you have many corpora that you want to feed one glosser, (for example two or more Quechua corpora), or one master corpus with a few smaller corpora which can use the master's glosser, you can send us an email and tell us which corpora should feed which glosser and we will set up the glosser for you, provide you with more instructions.

locale_own_glossers_question.message: I have my own glosser for the language I work on, can I use it?

locale_own_glossers_answer.message: Yes, you can use any glosser as long as it is wrapped in a "webservice." Send us an email and we will provide you with more instructions depending on the technology your glosser was implemented in.

locale_learn_scripting_question.message: I want to learn more about scripting/programming, can I help?

locale_learn_scripting_answer.message: Sure, we accept new "interns" on the team every semester. We can usually train you in things you want to learn, and find you a task to take on. Send us an email to introduce yourself, or join us on GitHub by commenting on, or adding an item in the issue tracker if you already have an account. If you have friends in Software Engineering or related disciplines who are looking for OpenSource projects to build their portfolio, we would be happy to welcome them as well.

locale_contact_answer.message: For any other questions or comments, you may send us an email or ask other users on Facebook.
locale_contact_answer.description: links screw up the json format so I leave it empty for the moment
